name: Glowing Skin Sugar Scrub - Choice of Sizes/Scents
description:
PLEASE LET US KNOW WHICH SCENT YOU'D LIKE OR ONE WILL BE CHOSEN FOR YOU.  Please use Note to Seller in the checkout process.  Thank you!

This AMAZING scrub is paraben-free and free of mineral oil! Gently polishes skin & is mild enough to be used daily. It provides a luxurious exfoliation with a non-irritating blend of pure cane sugar crystals and skin-softening Safflower Oil. Body scrubs are ideal for all over body cleansing, exfoliation and for stimulating circulation. Ours will both refine and soften the skin's texture in one easy step. It is formulated to delicately, but effectively slough away dead skin cells, rinse clean, and moisturize the skin to a supple, sensual glow.

AVAILABLE SCENTS: 
Toasted Marshmallow - everyone's favorite warm, sweet, sugary treat! 

Dulce de Leche - heavy cream & caramel come artfully blended together!

Cinnamon Sugar - spicy, warm cinnamon base dusted with light sugar notes.

Buttercream - butter, cream and sugar swirled to frosty perfection!

Apple Butter Caramel - mouthwatering spicy roasted apples in butter meet sweet caramel.


Recycle friendly jar that is labeled and ready for gift giving!  In sizes 4, 8 and 10 ounces.

Paraben Free
Non-comedogenic (will not clog pores)
Cruelty Free ~ No Animal Testing 
No Alcohol
No Mineral Oil
Hypo-Allergenic
Gluten Free

Ingredients: Sucrose, Carthamus tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Polysorbate 80, Tocopherol Acetate (Vitamin E), Silica, Phenoxyethanol

name: Creamy Walnut Face & Body Scrub - Choice of Size/Scents!
description:
PLEASE LET US KNOW WHICH SCENT YOU'D LIKE OR ONE MAY BE CHOSEN FOR YOU.  Let us know which you'd like in the Note to Seller during the checkout process.  Thank you!

Since we're so ready for fall, we're offering our new Creamy Walnut Face & Body Scrub in your choice of Fall/Halloween themed scents from our collection! 

This AMAZING scrub is paraben-free and free of mineral oil! Luxuriously thick and creamy textured body scrub is designed to help exfoliate the entire body, revealing a new layer of smooth, shiny, healthy skin. Every singe scoop of this scrub will gently remove dead skin cells and dirt, leaving the skin soft, cleansed, and hydrated. Suitable and ideal for dry and/or sensitive skin for all-over the body exfoliation. Full of natural oils and botanicals, this scrub doesn't skimp on the crushed walnut leaving a perfect consistency - it's not too thick or too thin, it's not tacky, sticky or greasy. Naturally tan in color with a shelf life of 2 years.

AVAILABLE SCENTS: 
Toasted Marshmallow - everyone's favorite warm, sweet, sugary treat! 

Dulce de Leche - heavy cream & caramel come artfully blended together!

Cinnamon Sugar - spicy, warm cinnamon base dusted with light sugar notes.

Buttercream - butter, cream and sugar swirled to frosty perfection!

Apple Butter Caramel - mouthwatering spicy roasted apples in butter meet sweet caramel.


This listing is for (1) one 10 ounce recycle friendly jar that is labeled and ready for gift giving!

Ingredients: Deionized Water, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder, TEA-Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Cetearyl Alcohol, Polysorbate 60, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Alcohol, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Symphytum Officinale Root Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Hexylene Glycol.

name: Luxurious Shower Gel - 2 sizes
description:
Our customers asked and we provided....shower gel is here at last! Silky, creamy, luxurious bubbles await you in the shower! Our formulation leaves you squeaky clean and softly scented. Choose from our handpicked spring collection of scents or choose from our list of 145 other scents.

Recycle friendly plastic bottle.

Ingredients: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Methylparaben, Methylchloroisothiazolinone,Methylisothiazolinone, Citric Acid, Sodium Chloride, Fragrance.

name: Goat Milk & Honey Lotion, Choice of Fall/Halloween Scents - 8 oz size
description:
Since we're so ready for fall, we're offering our Goat Milk & Honey Lotion in your choice of Fall/Halloween themed scents from our collection! This lotion is absolutely perfect. It's not waxy or greasy at all, sinking into your skin almost immediately, drenching you in moisture. 

 I, personally, use it right after shaving to replenish and moisturize my legs leaving me silky smooth and soft!

 AVAILABLE SCENTS: 
Toasted Marshmallow - everyone's favorite warm, sweet, sugary treat! 

Dulce de Leche - heavy cream & caramel come artfully blended together!

Cinnamon Sugar - spicy, warm cinnamon base dusted with light sugar notes.

Buttercream - butter, cream and sugar swirled to frosty perfection!

Apple Butter Caramel - mouthwatering spicy roasted apples in butter meet sweet caramel.

 
 This listing is for (1) one 8 ounce recycle friendly jar that is labeled and ready for gift giving!

 Ingredients: Water, Isopropyl Myristate, Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sunflower Oil, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Borate, Disodium EDTA, Propylparaben, Methylparaben, Diazolidinyl Urea, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance Oil.

 ☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆


 Check us out on Facebook for coupon codes, upcoming events & more!

name: Fluffy Body Butter
description:
Enough of this cold weather - we're ready for Spring!   We're proud to bring you our collection of handpicked scents for our spring line.  

This body butter is so fluffy and creamy smooth, it is abolutely perfect for those extra dry spots that need loving attention after this long winter! This forumla lasts for hours, even through washing. It's not waxy or greasy at all, sinking into your skin almost immediately, drenching you in moisture. 

I, personally, use it for my cracking heels in the winter to keep them soft and smooth. It works like a charm. It's also great right after shaving your legs to replenish your skin. It's just perfect! 

AVAILABLE SCENTS:
Rose & Violet (wild rose notes powdered with soft, sweet violets)

Lilac (a light floral lilac scent)

Lavender (a favorite bursting with floral and soft lavender notes)

Goat Milk & Honey (golden honey, buttermilk, vanilla sugar and sweet amber)

Watermelon Apricot (sweet and delicious pink watermelon with nuances of bright apricot and white florals)

Sweet Paris (sweet notes of blackberry, lemon and buttery vanilla)

This listing is for (1) one 4 ounce recycle friendly jar that is labeled and ready for gift giving!

Ingredients: Water, Isopropyl Myristate, Beeswax, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sunflower Oil, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Borate, Disodium EDTA, Propylparaben, Methylparaben, Diazolidinyl Urea, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance Oil.

name: Fall/Halloween Scented Solid Perfume 2 oz.
description:
Since we're so ready for Spring, we're offering our 2 ounce tin of solid perfume in YOUR choice from our Springtime scent line-up. Silky, smooth, creamy and the scent lasts and lasts! Perfect for tucking into your purse!  ALL NATURAL, color free formula.

AVAILABLE SCENTS:
Toasted Marshmallow - everyone's favorite warm, sweet, sugary treat! 

Dulce de Leche - heavy cream & caramel come artfully blended together!

Cinnamon Sugar - spicy, warm cinnamon base dusted with light sugar notes.

Buttercream - butter, cream and sugar swirled to frosty perfection!

Apple Butter Caramel - mouthwatering spicy roasted apples in butter meet sweet caramel.



2 ounce tin comes labeled and ready for gifting. 

Ingredients: Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (and) Lauryl Laurate (and) Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil (and) Hydrogenated Castor oil (and) Beeswax (and) Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (and) Hydrogenated Soybean Oil (and) Euphorbia Cerifera Candelilla) Wax, Fragrance Oil.

name: Mocha Coffee Bean Round Soap Bar
description:
Start your day off with a shot of mocha coffee in the shower! This delicious coffee house scent is simply divine! Dark rich coffee is studded with chocolate bits and steamy cream. Two multi-colored layers are topped off with a gigantic coffee bean for fun! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 6 ounce round bar . Each bar is different from the others due to swirling colorations.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Mica.

name: Girly Glittery Puffy Pink Hearts Guest Soaps - Set of 12
description:
So pretty and perfectly right for ANY guest bathroom or for gifting as a soap favor at a party! These puffy pink sparkly hearts are about the size of a quarter, which is about 3-5 uses for each one. 

Scent? We'll leave the choice up to you! Just let us know which you'd like! Please see our scent selection at: http://www.bluemoonbubbles.com/scent-selections

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 12 (twelve) quarter sized hearts, bagged together, labeled and tied with ribbon, ready for gifting!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Very Vanilla Buttercream Birthday Cake Round
description:
Make ANY day a special treat with our new Vanilla Birthday Cake soap! Loaded with lots of colorful jojoba beads for light exfoliation, our layered soap smells just like vanilla buttercream frosted cake! Happy Birthday to you!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce round bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Mica.

name: Crazy Wild Watermelon Soap Wedge
description:
This super fruity, juicy soap is perfect for summer! Fun to look at, delicious to smell and amazing to use! You get a very large 6 ounce wedge of layered soap scented in an amazing Wild Watermelon scent - the bright red layer comes with embedded organic poppy seeds for exfoliation! Just the perfect bar to use after a day at the beach! Scrubby, bubbly, lathery fun! 

Large 6 oz ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Myristate, Silica, Cocoyl Isethionate, Triethanolamine, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Organic Poppy Seeds.

name: Rock Star Girly Salt Scrubby Bar
description:
Be a shower rockstar! This hot pink/white/black layered bar is scented in bright and bubbly Rockin' The Stars - a duplicate of the famous Lush scent. (Vanilla, Strawberry, Violet and Jasmine) Fine sea salt is embedded in the scrubby pink layer for exfoliation. Flip it over to the black side for a lush, thick lather!


DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce rectangle bar . 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Dusty Rose & Gunmeltal Gray Swirly Bar
description:
This limited edition bar smells so amazing and is so pretty to look at. Swirls of dusty pink and gunmetal gray merge together in this delightful bar that is scented in a "Sandy Rose" scent with notes of vanilla, rose and sandalwood. 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4-5 ounce hand-cut bar . Each bar is different from the others due to swirling colorations.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Walking Dead Zombie Brain Cupcake Soap
description:
This novelty cupcake soap is absolutely PERFECT for any Walking Dead or zombie fans in your life. Gray zombie brains with red blood drippings sits atop a black and white soapy cupcake base. Scented in a fantastically silly "Dirt" scent - like freshly turned over green grass and black soil! (if you'd like a more traditional scent, we can do that too! Use Note To Seller.)

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 7 ounce cupcake soap . Each soap is different from the others due to colorations.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Golden Honey Bee Guest Soaps
description:
Buzz, Buzz! Welcome summer into your home in the form of these delightfully cute honey bee soaps! Scented in a rich Beeswax & Honey scent, these are dusted in a light coating of golden mica to accent their raised honey bee design. So, so adorable!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 2 (two) 2 ounce round bars.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Mica.

name: Medusa - Goddess Soap Bar
description:
She may not be a Goddess in the true sense, but she was certainly one tough cookie to mess with! Her story is both sad and endearing....changed into a monster only to be beheaded. To celebrate her strong personality, we chose this as the third in our Goddess Soap Bar line up. 

This two toned green/black swirled sparkling bar is scented in a special blend - Warm spice notes of pepper and cardamom blended with rosewood, sandalwood, vetiver, tonka bean and amber. Stamped with a silver Goddess image! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce round bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Fine Irridescent Glitter, Mica.

name: Patriotic Hot Apple Pie Swirly Soap Bar
description:
This bar smells so lovely - like a freshly baked, hot apple pie chock full of warm cinnamon notes. Brightly colored in a patriotic swirling red, white and blue! Extremely limited holiday edition - only 4 available! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4-5 ounce hand-cut bar . Each bar is different from the others due to swirling colorations.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Happy Rainbow Unicorn Ducky Soap Round
description:
Simply the cutest unicorn I've ever seen! A squeaky unicorn ducky with rainbow tresses sit atop a sparkly pinkish purple soap bar. Comes scented in a bright, fun fruity fresh scent! Large 6 ounce bar will give you lots of playtime in the tub!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 6 ounce round bar . 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Fine Glitter.

name: Saloon Girl Whiskey Angel Soap Bar
description:
I imagine this scent to be everything a saloon girl was. Vibrant, sweet, sassy and ready to kick it up at every turn! This bar is an ode to every wild whiskey loving woman out there! With a shot of bourbon, a nibble of white chocolate and the scent of a cedar planked floor beneath her boots, this bar is ready to dance the night away. A truly unique and fun loving scent! Triple colored in dark brown, cream and shimmery hints of gold. 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) hand cut 3-4.5 ounce bar. Each bar is different from the others.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Mica.

name: Gothic Black Rose Soap Bar
description:
Roses to the extreme! This beautifully swirled bar of soap is not only eye catching but smells so tantalizing! Black roses are blended with notes of lily, jasmine, violet and kissed by soft woods and sensual musk. 

Seriously, my whole soap room smells like a rose garden. It's strong, it's beautiful and it's only here for a VERY short time. Get them before they're gone!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) hand cut 3-4.5 ounce bar. Each bar is different from the others.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Black Glitter.

name: Huge Petit Four Soap Cubes
description:
Decisions, decisions! These petit four soaps are just to die for cute! Big chunky squares of soapy goodness! Choose luscious lemon cream or dark chocolate truffle! No matter which you choose, each is topped of with a fun flair of sprinkles on top for light exfoliation. 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce cube shaped bar. .

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Skin Safe Sprinkles.

description:
Surround yourself with good energy! These rainbow colored guest sized lotus soaps are perfect to bring harmony and balance to your bathroom! Brilliantly and brightly colored these are scented in a terrific "Energy" blend of citrus, including grapefruit, lemon and lime, with hints of fresh cucumber and jasmine, and a touch of pineapple, blackberry and champagne. Truly energetic and a great way to start your day off right! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 6 (six) 1.5 ounce bars, bagged together, labeled and tied with ribbon, ready for gifting!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Butterfly Guest Soaps - Set of 5
description:
What a cute addition to any guest bathroom! Five intricately carved butterflies are set in pastel tones and scented in a sweet blend of light berries and vanilla. Perfect for spring/summer! 

You get 5 (five) soaps weighing 1.5 ounces each, wrapped in a bag and tied with ribbon. Comes labeled and ready for gift giving!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Sacred Feminine/Goddess Vulva Soap
description:
Hail to the "V" indeed!  Celebrate your inner goddess with our cute, super sparkly vulva soap!  Intricately carved for detail, this soap is sure to bring a chuckle and a grin.  Perfect for bachelorette party favors!  

These come in purple or hot pink - both with a hearty sprinkling of sparkles for bling factor.  Scented in a bright, cheerful & juicy Pink Watermelon Apricot!

One (1) 3 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled, ready for gifting and giving.

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

Want a different color or scent for your party favor?  Just send us a note!  We can do that!  :)

name: Awareness Big Soap Bar
description:
Give some awareness to your cause with this big 5 ounce size soap bar! A large eye catching ribbon stands out from a creamy white background. Can be totally customized to your needs. (color/scent) Perfect for giveaways or gift baskets! 

Please choose your color/scent from our list located at the top of the page and leave us a selection in Note to Seller at the bottom of your order form or simply send us a quick note. 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce rectangle bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant,.

name: Wicked Witch Black Sea Salt Scrub Bar
description:
In an ode to Wicked and The Wizard of Oz, we designed our Wicked Witch Black Sea Salt Scrub Bar after the greatest villain we know and love. We topped our bar with coarse Hawaiian Black Sea Salt for exfoliation and gave the green layer lots of green glitter sparkle before scenting it in a deep, wonderful, mysterious Vetyver scent with touches of bright lemon and sandalwood. Dark, edgy and thrilling! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce square bar, shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Glitter.

name: The Mighty Mustache Soap Bar
description:
What a great gift for groomsmen! This detailed beefy, manly mustache sits atop a bar of contrasting white background. Choose your scent and color to match any mustached man in your life!

Please pick from our Manly Scent Selection:

Black Tie - sophisticated notes of black peppercorn and leather are carefully crafted with warm woods, patchouli, musk and citrus. Very manly!

Fifty Shades - seductive marriage of tainted rose and wild geranium with addictive, "can't live without it" notes of bergamot and gold amber.

Tobacco Caramel - Rich, warming tobacco blossom wrapped with caramel and notes of mandarin, honey and rose.

Barber Shoppe - Vibrant Bergamot and fresh basil leaf are complimented by earthy notes of Oakmoss and white patchouli.

Black Pepper - A crisp, bright peppery scent with bottom notes of lemon and bergamot.


(If you'd like another scent more appropriate for children, please see our other available scents at http://www.bluemoonbubbles.bigcartel.com/scent-selections and let us know which you'd like in the Notes to Seller box at the bottom of the order form.)

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

One (1) 4.3 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Mini Mighty Mustache Soap Favors
description:
What a great favor for groomsmen! These cute puffy little hand soaps make great favors for any mustache themed events! Perfect as guest soaps in the "man cave bathroom" too! Really, they're just adorable! You get the whole set of 10! 

Please pick from our Manly Scent Selection:

Black Tie - sophisticated notes of black peppercorn and leather are carefully crafted with warm woods, patchouli, musk and citrus. Very manly!

Fifty Shades - seductive marriage of tainted rose and wild geranium with addictive, "can't live without it" notes of bergamot and gold amber.

Tobacco Caramel - Rich, warming tobacco blossom wrapped with caramel and notes of mandarin, honey and rose.

Barber Shoppe - Vibrant Bergamot and fresh basil leaf are complimented by earthy notes of Oakmoss and white patchouli.

Black Pepper - a bright, crisp peppery scent with bottom notes of lemon and bergamot.

(If you'd like another scent more appropriate for children, please see our other available scents at http://www.bluemoonbubbles.bigcartel.com/scent-selections and let us know which you'd like in the Notes to Seller box at the bottom of the order form.)

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Ten (10) 1 ounce bars come bagged together and tied with black ribbon.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Lip Service Soap Bar
description:
Get some lip service in the shower with this fun and funky new soap bar! Scented in a delicious, lip smacking watermelon apricot scent, this bar features a dark purple base topped with a layer of white and lots of soap sprinkles surrounding a juicy pair of perky lips! So cute! Big 5 ounce size! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce square bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Skin Friendly Soap Sprinkles.

name: Bite Me Vampire/Goth Black Salt Scrub Bar
description:
For all my fellow vampire/gothic friends out there, I created a salt scrub bar just for you! This blood red soap is topped with black Hawaiian sea salt for exfoliation purposes. Scented in a drool worthy "Bite Me" scent - Fresh citrus notes of lime and orange sparkle with effervescent highlights as they lead to a luscious blend of berry and cherry in this playful scent. Leafy green accents add intensity as a base of vanilla creates deep, sweet tones. It's really just amazingly lustful! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Black Hawaiian Sea Salt.

name: Batman Soap Party Favor - Set of 7
description:
These adorable chunky, mini Batman Soap Favors will thrill any Bat fan out there! Perfect for a themed birthday party or a bachelor party favor for any fan boy! They come with a very bright neon yellow background with a black bat symbol and are scented in a "Tropical Punch" fruity blend. Comes in a 7 pack (4 larger, 3 mini's) with a cellophane bag tied with black curling ribbon ready for gift giving. 

Want some glitter added for a Bat Girl fan in your life? We can do that!

Please note these are smaller soaps. The larger are the size of a man's thumb and the mini is just slightly smaller than that. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Big Juicy Lips Soap Favors
description:
Perfect for any bachelorette or girly party, these big juicy lips are just plain awesome! They are scented in a playful and fruity "Butt Naked in Bed" scent with notes of apple, pear, melon, vanilla and musk. They come in a 10 pack of assorted girly colors: purple, pink and red. They arrive in a cellophane baggie tied with matching colored ribbons.

Want glitter? We can do that! Just let us know.

Each soap weighs in at 2 ounces.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Lemon Lovers Salty Scrub Bar
description:
Any fans of lemon will *love* this new salty scrub bar! Scented in a truly realistic lemony scent, this very bright, two toned, layered bar will definitely wake you up in your morning shower! Coarse sea salt is sprinkled into the top layer for gentle but effective exfoliation.

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce square bar, shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Red Hatters Ladies Soap Bar
description:
This is the perfect gift for any Red Hat lady in your life! A large detailed red hat with purple plumes sit atop a large 5 ounce white bar. Scented in matching 'Red Hat' fragrance - powdery purple violets tied with lush red roses, accented with hints of jasmine and fresh garden greens. 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Spring Time Tie Dye Soap Bar
description:
Indeed spring has come to the Hudson Valley where we live and all sorts of colored things are beginning to bloom! This soap represents all I've been seeing this early spring - green tree buds, purple hyacinth blooms and the return of the beautiful blue sky! Each layer is swirled with curly bits of white to give it the tie dye effect. Scented in a bright, light, airy Soapy Clean scent. Very fresh! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 to 5 ounce handcut bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Smiling Buddha Soap Bar
description:
This pearly white smiling buddha is sure to make YOU smile! Cheerful, plump buddha sits happily while you suds away! All natural and scented in a bright, crisp Energy scent with notes of Grapefruit, Lemon and Lime, with hints of fresh Cucumber and Jasmine, and a touch of Pineapple, Blackberry and Champagne. Accented with gold mica for effect!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Granulated Sugar.

name: Gamer Health/Mana Potion Body Wash
description:
For my fellow Azerothians - get ready to power up your shower time with our mana and/or health potion body washes. In vibrant blue for mana or cherry red for health pots, these look nearly identical to the graphic version. 

Scented in a delectable, subtle & sexy Vanilla Oak (unisex), you'll swear you're walking through the woods of Teladrassil. (well, before Deathwing burned it to cinders at least) 

A great gift for any gaming fan!

name: Mythical Dragon Soap Bar
description:
Sure to delight any dragon lover, this Dragon's Breath scented soap bar is simply amazing to smell with spicy notes of amber, myrrh, sandalwood and patchouli. Highly detailed dragon is accented with a dusting of gold mica for added effect. Your choice of dragon colors.

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Old Country Basket Soap Bar
description:
Country charm through and through! This large soap bar is made to look like basketweave. Scented in a country blend of Twigs & Berries with notes of currant, orange, cinnamon, peach and hints of wood. Smells like an old country store full of yummy candles!

Large 6 ounce bar comes wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Golden Goddess Soap Bar
description:
This super cute glycerin soap bar beckons to your inner goddess! Scented in a Philosophy "Amazing Grace" duplicate with notes of rose, lemon, cinnamon and white musk. Wonderful scent! Shiny black background features a shimmering golden goddess.

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Big English Rose Soap Bar
description:
What girl doesn't love roses?! This big, palm sized soap will thrill any girly girl out there. Scented in a heady English Tea Rose, you have your choice of colors below. (please let me know which color you want or one will be chosen for you)

Large 4 ounces.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Valentine Polka Dot Soap Bar
description:
Scented in a very bold and bright Black Cherry Bomb, this soap is just too cute! Vibrant pink, purple and red polka dots float in a white background. Perfect for Valentine's Day to let someone know they're "the bomb"!

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. Please allow for some variation as these are hand cut.

Ingredients: Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Myristate, Silica, Cocoyl Isethionate, Triethanolamine, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Beeswax & Honey Farmhouse Bar
description:
This amazing honey based soap will blow you away with it's Beeswax & Honey scent. So rich, deep and fresh smelling. Comes looking like an old fashioned country style Farmhouse soap. Just a beautiful bar all around. No added coloring...just pure glowing, natural honey colored.

Each huge bar weighs in at a whopping 6.5 ounces. Comes wrapped, labeled and ready to go!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Cheesecake Scented Sugar Scrub Bar
description:
Get your scrub on! This cheesecake soap is perfect for these tough winter months where dry skin is such a problem! The white side is scented in a decadent vanilla cheesecake scent while the back side is scent in a divine gingersnap cookie! It's a two-fer! Lather with the white side, then flip the bar over to the brown back side and use its sugared base as a scrubbing agent on those dry, tough spots like elbows, knees and anywhere else you need some light exfoliating action. No messy oily scrubs making the bathtub slippery anymore! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Granulated Sugar

name: Smelly Jellie Flameless Candle
description:
What are Smelly Jellies? They are flameless candles that are made from a polymer gel that expands when it interacts with liquids. These make them perfect for the office, dorm or in a child's room where you want to add scent but no flame! They slowly evaporate and contract over time. We double scent our Smelly Jellies to give you lots of long lasting scent!

This is for (1) one 12 ounce glass jar with a perforated lid that allows for scent throw. Choose your own scent and color to match any decor. We chose scents that offer a lot of throw so you can smell them anywhere in the room!

AVAILABLE SCENTS:
Lilac
Blue Hawaiian
Black Cherry Bomb
Black Currant Vanilla
Absinthe
Enchanted Apple
Marachino Cherry

These will ship bubble wrapped with a plastisol liner so there will be no leakage/spillage. I will also put them in a ziplock bag for extra assurance.

name: Almond & Honey Goat's Milk Soap Slice
description:
Sinfully luscious goat's milk and honey bases blend together to suspend beautiful calendula petals through this bar which is scented in a lush, rich blend of Almond & Honey scent. Gorgeous to look at and lathers like a dream. This dual formulation is just amazing to feel on the skin! Not to mention the scent is divine - so soft and natural.

COLORANT, DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4 ounce hand cut bar so please allow for some variation.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Cute Chunky Triple Heart Soaps
description:
These super cute soaps will thrill any Valentine! Each has two tiny hearts contrasting atop a big, girly, swirly heart! So adorable! Your choice of scent from our 8 hand picked Valentine's Day scents.

Please indicate which color you'd like in a message to me through payment process or else one will be chosen for you based on scent selection.

AVAILABLE SCENTS:
Rose & Violet (wild rose notes powdered with soft, sweet violets)
Love Spell type (lush blend of orange, peach, cherry blossom and white jasmine)
Pearberry (juicy blend of pear, boysenberry, ripe raspberry and blackberry)
Champagne (crispy, bubbly champagne notes)
Pink Panties (girly notes of sweet citrus, jasmine, water lily, sweet pea and white orchid)
Love Dust (delicious raw honey, cocoa butter, vanilla and chocolate notes)
Lick Me All Over (playful blend of vanilla, orange, pineapple and cherry)
Butt Naked In Bed (a frisky blend of apple, pear, melon, vanilla and musk notes)


DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 3 ounce heart shaped bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Puffy Valentine Heart Guest Soaps
description:
So cute and adorable! Chunky, puffy red hearts perch atop a milky white base scented in the famous and loved duplication of Love Spell from Victoria's Secret - a delicious blend of orange, peach, cherry blossom and white jasmine. So juicy and sweet smelling! 

You get 4 of these sweet little soaps, perfect for Valentine's Day! They come in a cello bag tied with curly ribbon and ready for gifting! (or keeping!)

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 4 (four) 2.5 ounce round bars.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Ixacacao the Goddess of Chocolate Soap Bar
description:
Second from our Goddess line, is Ixacacao, the Mayan Goddess of Chocolate. The Goddess of Chocolate reminds us that a luxurious world unfolds before your eyes if only you will take a moment to still your "busy-ness" and rejoice in those things which give you pleasure. Like taking a bath with a deliciously scented soap! 

This two toned bar is scented with notes of rich cookie dough blended with milk chocolate chips, vanilla, brown sugar and a hint of rum. Stamped with the golden Goddess image! 

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 5 ounce round bar.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Soy Wax Tarts/Melts
description:
Designed to be used in a candle or electric warmer, these tarts are just to die for delicious smelling!  Made using soy wax, a natural, renewable and biodegradable source. Burns cooler and slower than paraffin wax for better scent throw. Cleans easily with soap and water once cooled.

We have them is several scents!

Frosted Cupcakes - a mouth watering, baked to perfection vanilla cupcake that is topped with sugary sweet buttercream icing!

Caribbean Chocolate - a decadent blend of crafted dark chocolate truffles and rich fudge brownie chunks, masterfully blended with rich buttercream and classic vanilla gelato.

Blue Hawaiian - Heavy on the coconut with notes of pineapple, cherries, lemon, orange and vanilla rum

Apples & Oak - Freshly picked Macintosh and Granny Smith apples mingle with notes of fresh oak leaves and oak moss

Juicy Couture - notes of wild berry, jasmine, honeysuckle, gardenia, caramel, vanilla and sandalwood

Iced Cinnamon Buns - ooey, gooey fresh baked cinnamon rolls await you! Notes of clove and butter add to this delicious treat!

Cashmere Sands - a very sexy, sensual, exotic mix of sandlewood, carnation and musk. Very floral and light.

To use, simply break off one of the squares and place in your approved wax burner. Can be remelted several times until no longer fragranced. 

The Not So Fun Warning:
Please follow these instructions. Use only in a dry, well ventilated tea-light burner or UL listed electric warmer approved for wax melts. Never heat on stove or electric appliance where temperature would exceed 190 degrees F or flash fire could occur. NEVER ADD WATER. Keep out of reach of children & pets. Keep wax free of matches, wick trimmings & flammable materials. Do not move while wax is hot. Failure to follow instructions could result in fire, injury or some damage.

name: Creamy, Dreamy Lip Balms
description:
These are our ALL NATURAL lipsmacking, dreamy, creamy lip balms!  Comes in 5 different sweetened flavors to leave your lips soft, smooth and totally kissable!

Coconut Cream - a delicious blend of sweet vanilla and coconut milk. Uncolored for unisex appeal.

Double Bubblegum - a lip licking blend of strawberry, orange, mint and spun sugar. Colored a very light pink with lip friendly mica!

Fresh Mint - a lip tingling blend of spearmint and peppermint. Uncolored for unisex appeal!

Summer Melon - a yummy blend of watermelon, honeydew and cantaloupe. Touched with just a bit of red mica for a shimmery sheer kiss of color.

Pink Cotton Candy - a sugary blend of strawberry, spun sugar, Tonka bean and vanilla. Touched with just a bit of pink mica for a shimmery sheer kiss of color.

.15 ounce tubes come labeled and ready for gifting. 

Ingredients: Castor Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Lauryl Laurate, Olive Oil, Beeswax, Carnauba Wax, Soybean Oil, Candelilla Wax, Flavor Oil, Mica.

name: Yuletide Soap Ball
description:
These soap balls are so cool with 7 layers of colorful Yuletide fun! Cheerfully scented in First Snow with frosty notes of mint, jasmine and light pine. These would be beautiful guest soaps for this holiday season!

Big 4 oz ounce bar comes shrinkwrapped and is labeled. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Seed Butter, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Yummy Six Layer Dessert Soap Bar
description:
What a treat! This heavenly 6 layer bar has three scents in one! Layer upon layer of yummy sea salt caramel, toasted marshmallow and dark, rich chocolate! Just marvelous! I can't quit sniffing this one!

DETERGENT AND SLS FREE!

Listing is for 1 (one) 4-5 ounce bar. As bars are handcut, please allow for some variation.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Autumn Falling Leaves Trio Soap Set
description:
These beautiful leaves are colored in the shades of fall. These all natural, DETERGENT FREE soaps are scented in a warm wood scent, crackling with fire and with light hints of raspberry and vanilla. 

You get 3- 3 oz ounce bars that come shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Hippy Trippy Rainbow Tie Dye Soap
description:
This is our Hippy Trippy Rainbow Tie Dye Soap Bar in a really juicy Kiwi Watermelon scent! 6 layers of swirly fun!  Perfect as favors for any rainbow themed event!  

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Red & Silver Rocket Ship Soap
description:
What little boy wouldn't love this?!  This silver and red rocket is ready to go on a bath time adventure with your little man.  Let his imagination soar with this rocket ship on a rope soap.  Scented in super bright mix of pineapple, cherry and orange.  

3.5 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.  

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Shamrock/Clover Soap Bar
description:
Our shamrock bar is so intricate and delicate with it's entwining clovers.  Very pretty!  It is scented in the *amazing* Oakmoss Sandalwood - a sexy unisex blend of oakmoss, sandalwood, tonka bean, cedarwood, lemon and petigrain.  Perfect for an Irish themed wedding!

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled.  

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Girly Playboy Bunny Soap Party Favors - 10 pack
description:
These adorable chunky, mini Playboy Bunnies are the perfect favor for any Bachelor or Bachelorette party!  They come in Girly pink, bright red and black coloring then are scented in a sexy "Lick Me All Over" fruity blend.  Comes in a 10 pack with a cellophane bag tied with black & white curling ribbon ready for gift giving.  Each bunny is about the size of your thumb.  

Want some glitter added?  We can do that!

See our other items for more bunny colors!  

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Honey Bee Guest Soaps - Set of 2
description:
This cute baby honey bee is done up in a dual layer bar of skin softening honey and soy milk.  The brown layer is honey, the white is soy milk and it's scented in a deliciously sweet Beeswax and Honey scent.  You get 2 guest size square bars.  So adorable and perfect for summer.

2 - 1.5 ounce bar come shrink wrapped and labeled.  

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Classic Playboy Bunny Soap Favors - 10 pack
description:
These adorable chunky, mini Playboy Bunnies are the perfect favor for any Bachelor or Bachelorette party! Classic black and white coloring then scented in a sexy "Lick Me All Over" fruity blend, these glycerin soaps come in a 10 pack with a cellophane bag tied with black & white curling ribbon ready for gift giving. Each bunny is about the size of your thumb. 

See our other items for more bunny colors! 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Twilight Inspired Soap Bars - LIMITED EDITION
description:
BUY ALL 4 AND SAVE $1.50 PER SOAP!

I'm such a huge Twilight fan, this is my tribute soaps to the series. This would be an amazing stocking stuffer for any fan this Christmas! I tried to capture them in sunlight so you could see all the glittery, sparkley fun.

These are part of a 4 piece set. Each is a whopping, heavy 6.5 ounces. These are big, thick bars of lovely, lathery glycerin soap. 

Eclipse (black soap) - featuring a triple layer of blue twilight fading into a black night sky with glittery stars. This feminine and sexy soap has notes of red currant, freesia, apple blossom, frangipani, jasmine, amber, wood, and light musk. Very light, crispy and fresh.

Edward's Temptation (green/white) - Edward had green eyes before he was turned into a vampire. The sparkling white is for his beautiful vampire skin in the sunlight. This soap smells amazingly fresh and clean with herby notes of bergamot, rosemary, moss, sandalwood, mint, and amber. Definately not your average boring man scent! Very dramatic and clean smelling.

Jacob's Desire (triple brown) - features a triple brown calico pattern for his multi-colored brown fur in his wolf form. And this scent, ladies, will drive you wild. So warm, alluring and down right sexy with notes of mandarin, pepper, cypress, ebony wood, leather, amber, musk. Hot, inviting and sensual!

Bella's Kiss (reddish gold) - features a red and gold flecked coloring for her pretty lips. Smells amazingly light with notes of violet, gardenia, jasmine, grapefruit, vanilla and white woods. Reminds me of the field where Edward and Bella sit talking (and kissing!) all the time. Very pretty and girly.

name: Celtic Irish Claddagh Soap Bar
description:
This soap is just amazingly detailed!  Based on the traditional Irish claddagh symbol for love, friendship and loyalty, this soap would be the perfect favor for an Irish themed wedding.  These ones are beautifully scented in an Origin's duplicate of Perfect World - a unique unisex blend with notes of red apple, juicy peach, cyclamen, freesia, and sweet lily before amber and musk provide a soft, dreamy, mysterious drydown.  
 
Each soap weighs in at 2.5 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/shipping info.

Wouldn't these make the *perfect* wedding or shower favor for your guests?!  This amazing mini 3 tiered cake soap has a ruffled colored layer (your choice of color) in the middle and a lovely bride and groom stamped on top.  These are scented in Wedding Cake, of course, which is a decadent blend of moist vanilla cake, cane sugar and creamy white frosting.  It smells JUST like the real thing.  One of our favorites!

Each soap weighs in at around 3 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/color selection/shipping info.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Mini Tiered Wedding Cake Soap
description:
Wouldn't these make the *perfect* wedding or shower favor for your guests?!  This amazing mini 3 tiered cake soap has a ruffled colored layer (your choice of color) in the middle and a lovely bride and groom stamped on top.  These are scented in Wedding Cake, of course, which is a decadent blend of moist vanilla cake, cane sugar and creamy white frosting.  It smells JUST like the real thing.  One of our favorites!

Each soap weighs in at around 3 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/color selection/shipping info.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Beautiful Love Birds Heart Shaped Soap Bar
description:
Wouldn't these make the *perfect* wedding or shower favor for your guests?!  

This sweet love bird pair sits atop a colored chunky heart of your color choice.  These are so easy to coordinate with any wedding, shower or party colors.  These lovelies are scented in a delightful plumeria.

Each soap weighs in at around 3 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/color selection/shipping info.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Heart Shaped Bow and Wedding Band Soap Bar
description:
Wouldn't these make the *perfect* wedding or shower favor for your guests?!  

This pretty little soap is just darling!  Two intertwining rings are topped off with a bow and are perched atop a chunky heart.  So easy to coordinate with your wedding or bridal shower colors.  Rings can be in gold or silver.  These come scented in Be Delicious - a sophisticated blend of ruby cassis, ripe pineapple, sweet rose blossoms and dewy fresh air.  


Each soap weighs in at around 3 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/color selection/shipping info.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Fancy Paisley Guest Soap Set of Three
description:
These little lovelies are one of my personal favorites!  Palm sized and perfect for guest soaps, these soaps feature a beautiful ornate pattern across the paisley teardrop shape.  Can be coordinated to any color you wish.  These come scented in a zippy, refreshing Cranberry Pomegranate.

Each soap weighs in at around 2 ounces.  You get 3 soaps per order.

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: I Do Bride/Groom Wedding Soap
description:
Wouldn't these make the *perfect* wedding or shower favor for your guests or for your bridesmaids?! 

We think this chunky soap is just too adorable! Fancy, swirly "I DO" and a lovely couple are etched into the soap. This soap comes scented in sweet, Springy notes of Apricot & Freesia. Can be easily adapted to any color scheme for your wedding or bridal party! (ribbon not included)

Each soap weighs in at around 2 ounces.

If you'd like to bulk order these for a wedding, please contact us for pricing/color selection/shipping info.

Ingredients:   Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Zesty Lime Loofah Scrubby Soap Round
description:
This scent is a knock out! A zippy blend of lime, grapefruit, tangerine and lemon will definitely wake you up in the morning. This all natural, DETERGENT FREE soap bar is triple layered in hot pink, white and green and has a small scrubby loofah embedded inside to scrub you clean and give you bright, healthy looking skin. 

5 oz ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Loofah.

name: Green Fae Absinthe Soap Bar
description:
Our much beloved Green Fae Absinthe soap is BACK for a limited time! 

Super green just like the drink with swirls of sparkly white! Scented in the most decadent, sinful Absinthe scent (think black licorice with herbal notes). Let the green fairy make your bath time that much more magical!

DETERGENT/SLS FREE!

Ingredients:  Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Gold Digger Bling Soap Bar
description:
This flashy, glittery, sparkling 24 karat gold colored bar is for the girl who wants it all and knows how to get it. Allow yourself to be pampered in the luxurious lather & the Strawberries & Champagne scent. Truly a treat for any Miss Thing out there!

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Micro Glitter.

name: Kitchen Scrubbie Soap Bar
description:
These soaps are perfect in any kitchen with their scrubby power and skin softening oils! The Lemon Tea Tree soap (yellow) smells like a herbal, fresh lemon picked straight off the tree. It has poppy seed scrubbies embedded inside. The Cranberry Pomegranate (red) features cranberry scrubby seeds and a crispy, refreshing scent. Lastly, the Pomegranate & Sweet Orange (orange) features skin softening Vitamin E to soothe overwashed and overworked kitchen hands and orange peel scrubbies. 

Buy ALL 3 for a discount!  Perfect as home warming or hostess gifts!

Ingredients:  Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.  (May also contain Vitamin E, cranberry seeds, lemon peel)

name: Blueberry Lemonade Scrubby Soap Bar
description:
These soaps smell amazing! Bright, zesty lemonade scent and juicy, plump blueberries meet in this beautiful blue/lemon layered soap. Lemon layer has tiny blueberry seeds for a light exfoliating effect. 

Each soap weighs in at 5 ounces and ship direct to you packaged, labeled and ready to go.

name: Nectarine Blossom & Calendula Honey Soap Bar
description:
Such a pretty bar! This honey based bar is embedded with calendula flowers for light exfoliation and visual appeal. Scented in Nectarine Blossom - a sweet, summery blend of nectarine, peach, black currant, green apple, lemon, and green mandarin notes with middle notes of jasmine, lily, ylang, and honey, with clean musk and earthy vetiver in the end. Dreamy and enchanting!

6 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Glycerin, propylene glycol, sodium stearate, sodium laureth sulfate, sorbitol, coconut oil, sodium myristate, triethanolamine, sodium laurate, sodium cocoate, purified water, honey, calendula petals, fragrance.

name: Exotic Yuzu & Blood Orange Exfoliating Soap Bar
description:
These orange bars are sure to be a treat in any tub! Scented in an delectable blend of yuzu and blood orange, these soaps have Valencia orange zest scrubbies inside for a light exfoliating effect. 

4 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Fragrance Oil, Colorant, Organic Orange Peel.

name: Juicy Pink Pomegranate Soap Bar
description:
This pink pomegranate bar is so fruity and delicious! You can just smell the flavorful juices! This Hot Pink Pomegranate scent is a not-so-ordinary blend of pomegranate, zesty citrus, jasmine and violet leaf notes. It's really pink smelling (if pink had a scent) and delicious! Designed with a faux "honeycomb" topper for texture and visual appeal.

4-5 oz ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. Some variation in size as these are handcut.

Ingredients: Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Myristate, Silica, Cocoyl Isethionate, Triethanolamine, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Food Grade Gel Colorant.

name: Tropical Rio Rumberry Carnivale Soap Bar
description:
Stave off winter just a little longer with our super juicy, tropical scented Rio Rumberry soap. Cheerfully colored in yellow, orange and red for the vibrant colors evocative of Rio's Carnivale! Notes of Lychee nectar, starfruit and rumberry pervade this exotic blend! Cast in a beautiful, ornate paisley soap mold.

5 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients: Sorbitol, Propylene Glycol, Water, Sodium Stearate, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Myristate, Silica, Cocoyl Isethionate, Triethanolamine, Glycerin, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.

name: Squeaky Clean Man in the Moon Soap Bar
description:
Our new signature soap is just too adorable! Smiling man in the moon smiles at you from a sparkley dark blue background. Wonderfully scented in a peppy, clean, fresh laundry scent.

3 ounce bar comes shrink wrapped and labeled. 

Ingredients:  Ingredients: Sodium Cocoate, Propylene Glycol , Sodium Stearate, Glycerin, Water, Sorbitol, Titanium Dioxide, Fragrance Oil, Colorant.
